content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maria. I appreciate your time. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your proposed price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
1000 Euros per month

I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to rent the apartment at that price. I agree to the rental price of 1000 Euros per month, and we can proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
900 Euros per month

I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month for the apartment.

I would like to discuss some terms and conditions.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your counteroffer, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am open to discussing the terms and conditions of the lease agreement. What are some of the terms and conditions you would like to discuss?
name: Heinrich Heine
